thread.title: Global economy: PMIs point to steady growth, UK lags

title: Global economy: PMIs point to steady growth, UK lags
text:
Global economy: PMIs point to steady growth, UK lags 9:20pm IST - 01:48 
The euro zone's manufacturing boom slowed a little further last month but factories across the bloc still appear to be enjoying their best growth spell in almost two decades. China's manufacturing data was also positive but, as David Pollard reports, the UK was once again the laggard.
